data.text: Warri jireenyi isaanii mudaa hin qabne,
Warri ajajawwan isaa eegan,
Isaan balleessaa hin hojjetan;
Akka Seerri kee amanamummaadhaan
Akka ani ajaja kee eeguuf
Ani utuun ajajawwan kee hunda xiyyeeffadhee ilaalee
Ani yommuun seera kee qajeelaa sana baradhutti,
Ani sirna keetiif nan bula;
Dargaggeessi akkamitti jireenya qulqulluu jiraachuu dandaʼa?
Ani garaa koo guutuudhaan sin barbaada;
Ani akkan cubbuu sitti hin hojjenneef,
Yaa Waaqayyo, galanni siif haa taʼu;
Ani seera afaan keetii baʼu hundumaa,
Akkuma namni tokko badhaadhummaa guddaatti gammadu,
Ajajawwan kee irra deddeebiʼee nan yaada;
Ani sirna keetti nan gammada;
Akka ani jiraadhuu fi dubbii kee eeguuf,
Akka ani seera kee keessatti
Ani lafa irratti keessummaa dha;
Lubbuun koo yeroo hunda
Ati of tuultota warra abaaramoo,
Waan ani seera kee eeguuf,
Bulchitoonni walii wajjin taaʼanii yoo maqaa na balleessan iyyuu,
Ajajni kee gammachuu koo ti;
Lubbuun koo biyyootti maxxante;
Yeroo ani waaʼee karaa koo sitti himetti,
Barsiisa seera keetii na hubachiisi;
Lubbuun koo gaddaan laafteerti;
Karaa sobaa irraa na fageessi;
Ani karaa dhugaa filadheera;
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani ajaja kee
Sababii ati hubannaa koo naa balʼifteef
Yaa Waaqayyo, akka ani sirna kee duukaa buʼu na barsiisi;
Akka ani seera kee eegee garaa koo guutuun
Daandii ajajawwan keetii irra na deemsisi;
Garaa koo gara ofittummaadhaan faayidaa argachuutti utuu hin taʼin,
Ija koo waan faayidaa hin qabne irraa deebisi;
Ati akka sodaatamtuuf,
Salphina ani sodaadhu narraa fageessi;
Kunoo, ani sirna kee nan hawwa;
Yaa Waaqayyo, jaalalli kee kan hin geeddaramne sun,
yoos ani sababii dubbii kee amanadhuuf,
Waan ani seera kee abdadheef,
Bara baraa hamma bara baraatti,
Ani ajaja kee waanan barbaaduuf,
Ani waaʼee ajaja keetii mootota duratti nan dubbadha;
waan ani ajajawwan kee jaalladhuuf,
Ani gara ajajawwan kee kanneen ani jaalladhu sanaatti  harka koo ol nan fudhadha;
Waadaa tajaajilaa keetiif seente sana yaadadhu;
Rakkina koo keessatti jajjabinni koo kana:
Of tuultonni akkuma barbaadanitti natti qoosu;
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani seera kee durii sana nan yaadadha;
Sababii hamoota warra seera kee dhiisaniitiif,
Iddoo keessummummaa koo hundatti
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani halkan keessa maqaa kee nan yaadadha;
Waan ani ajaja kee eegeef,
Yaa Waaqayyo, ati qooda koo ti;
Ani garaa koo guutuun fuula kee barbaaddadheera;
Ani karaa koo itti deddeebiʼee yaadeera;
Ani ajajawwan kee eeguuf,
Hamoonni yoo funyoodhaan na hidhan iyyuu,
Sababii seera kee qajeelaa sanaatiif,
Ani warra si sodaatan hundaaf,
Yaa Waaqayyo, lafti jaalala keetiin guutamteerti;
Yaa Waaqayyo, ati akkuma dubbii keetiitti,
Murtii gaarii fi beekumsa na barsiisi;
Ani utuun hin rakkatin karaa irraa badee ture;
Ati gaarii dha; wanni ati hojjettus gaarii dha;
Of tuultonni yoo sobaan maqaa na balleessan iyyuu,
Onneen isaanii mooraan haguugamteerti;
Akka ani sirna kee baradhuuf,
Meetii fi warqee kumaatama irra,
Harki kee na uume; na tolches;
Sababii ani dubbii kee abdadheef,
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani akka murtiin kee qajeelaa taʼe,
Akkuma ati tajaajilaa keetiif waadaa galte sanatti,
Akka ani lubbuun jiraadhuuf gara laafinni kee gara koo haa dhufu;
Of tuultonni waan sababii malee na yakkaniif haa qaanaʼan;
Warri si sodaatan, kanneen seera kee hubatan
Akka ani hin qaanofneef
Lubbuun koo fayyisuu kee hawwuudhaan gaggabdi;
Iji koo waadaa kee eeggachuudhaan dadhabe;
Qalqalloo wayinii kan aara keessa ture
Tajaajilaan kee hamma yoomiitti obsuu qaba?
Of tuultonni warri akka seera keetiitti hin bulle,
Ajajawwan kee hundinuu amanamoo dha;
Isaan lafa irraa na balleessuu gaʼanii turan;
Ati akkuma jaalala keetiitti lubbuu koo baraari;
Yaa Waaqayyo, dubbiin kee bara baraan jiraata;
Amanamummaan kee dhaloota hundaaf itti fufa;
Sababii wanni hundinuu si tajaajiluuf,
Utuu seerri kee gammachuu naa taʼuu baatee,
Sababii ati isaan na jiraachifteef,
Sababii ani kan kee taʼeef na fayyisi;
Hamoonni na balleessuuf na eeggachaa jiru;
Ani akka wanni mudaa hin qabnee hundinuu daangaa qabu argeera;
Ani seera kee akkaman jaalladha!
Ajajawwan kee waan yeroo hunda na wajjin jiraniif,
Ani sababiin irra deddeebiʼee seera kee yaaduuf,
Ani sababiin ajaja kee eeguuf,
Ani akkan dubbii kee eeguuf,
Waan ati mataan kee na barsiifteef,
Dubbiin kee akkam arraba kootti miʼaawa;
Ani qajeelfama kee irraa hubannaa argadheera;
Dubbiin kee miilla kootiif ibsaa dha;
Ani akkan seera kee qajeelaa sana eeguuf, kakadheera;
Ani akka malee dhiphadheen jira; yaa Waaqayyo,
Yaa Waaqayyo,  galata fedhiidhaan afaan kootii baʼu fudhadhu;
Jireenyi koo yeroo hunda harka koo keessa jiraatu iyyuu,
Hamoonni kiyyoo naa kaaʼaniiru;
Seerri kee dhaala koo kan bara baraa ti;
Garaan koo hamma dhumaatti
Ani nama yaada lamaa nan jibba;
Ati iddoo ani itti baqadhuu fi gaachana koo ti;
Akka ani ajajawwan Waaqa koo eeguuf,
Ati akkuma waadaa keetiitti na deeggari;  anis nan jiraadha;
Akka ani nagaadhaan jiraadhuuf na deeggari;
Sababii gowwoomsaan isaanii faayidaa hin qabneef;
Ati hamoota lafa irraa hunda akka kosiitti gatta;
Foon koo si sodaachuudhaan hollata;
Ani waan qajeelaa fi tolaa hojjedheera;
Nagaan jiraachuu tajaajilaa keetii mirkaneessi;
Iji koo fayyisuu kee eeguudhaan,
Akkuma jaalala keetiitti tajaajilaa kee yaadadhu;
Ani tajaajilaa kee ti;
Yaa Waaqayyo, kun yeroo ati itti hojjettuu dha;
Kanaafuu ani warqee caalaa,
ani akka seerri kee hundi qajeelaa taʼe nan amana;
Sirni kee dinqisiisaa dha;
Ibsamuun dubbii keetii ifa kenna;
Ani ajajawwan kee hawwuudhaan
Ati akkuma yeroo hunda warra maqaa kee jaalataniif gootu sana,
Akkuma dubbii keetiitti tarkaanfii miilla kootii naa qajeelchi;
Akka ani ajaja kee eeguuf
Akka fuulli kee tajaajilaa kee irratti ifu godhi;
Sababii namoonni seerra kee hin eegneef,
Yaa Waaqayyo, ati qajeelaa dha;
Seerri ati kennite qajeelaa dha;
Sababii diinonni koo dubbii kee dagataniif,
Waadaan kee sirriitti qoramee ilaalameera;
Xinnaadhee tuffatamu iyyuu,
Qajeelummaan kee bara baraan jiraata;
Rakkinnii fi dhiphinni natti dhufeera;
Seerri kee bara baraan qajeelaa dha;
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani garaa koo guutuudhaan sin waammadha;
Ani sittin iyyadha; ati na fayyisi;
Ani utuu lafti hin bariʼin kaʼee gargaarsaaf nan iyyadha;
Akka ani irra deddeebiʼee waadaa kee yaaduuf,
Akkuma jaalala keetiitti sagalee koo dhagaʼi;
Warri daba mariʼatan as dhiʼoo jiru;
Yaa Waaqayyo, ati garuu dhiʼoo jirta;
Akka ati ajajawwan kee bara baraan hundeessite,
Dhiphina koo argiitii na oolchi;
Dubbii koo naa falmi; na furis;
Sababii isaan sirna kee hin barbaanneef,
Yaa Waaqayyo, gara laafinni kee guddaa dha;
Diinonni koo warri na ariʼatan baayʼee dha;
Sababii isaan dubbii keetiif hin ajajamneef,
Akkam akka ani qajeelfama kee jaalladhu mee ilaali;
Dubbiin kee hundinuu dhugaa dha;
Bulchitoonni sababii malee na ariʼatan;
Ani akka nama boojuu guddaa argate tokkootti,
Ani soba nan jibba; nan xireeffadhas;
Sababii seera kee qajeelaa sanaatiif,
Warri seera kee jaallatan nagaa guddaa qabu;
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani fayyisuu kee nan abdadha;
Ani waanan guddaa isa jaalladhuuf,
Ati karaa koo hunda waan beektuuf,
Yaa Waaqayyo, iyyi koo fuula kee dura haa gaʼu;
Waammanni koo fuula kee dura haa gaʼu;
Sababii ati qajeelfama kee na barsiiftuuf,
Arrabni koo dubbii kee haa faarfatu;
Waan ani sirna kee filadheef,
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani fayyisuu kee nan hawwa;
Lubbuun koo si galateeffachuuf haa jiraattu;
Ani akkuma hoolaa badee karaa irraa jalʼadheera.
